title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.17 - Certificates and notices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.17 - Certificates and notices

State Regulations

Any notices, certificates, directions, instructions, consents or other communications from the issuer to the State Comptroller shall
be: (a) in writing; (b) signed by the chief executive officer or
chief fiscal officer of the issuer or such other officer of the issuer as may
be authorized by statute, resolution, ordinance, charter, by-laws or other
delegation acceptable to the State Comptroller to execute such documents; and
(c) sent by registered or
certified mail, return receipt requested or delivered by hand or by a courier
service, in either case, return receipt requested or sent by facsimile
transmission followed by confirmation of receipt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
38.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
